title: Google Camera port edit files?
content: Hi so I am an LG Stylo 4 user and I am planning to use a Google Camera Port and editing it's files to allow HDR+ and possible distribute it to other LG Stylo 4 users but before I do so is it legal for me to one, edit the google camera source code files. Two, can I distribute this new google camera port based off of the previous one.
